[1;32mParameter docstrings: =====================[0m

[1;34mM_gm: gut capacity in C-moles for unit of gut volume[0m [1;31mr_w2l: body width to length ratio[0m [1;34mr_gut_w: gut width relative to body width[0m [1;31my_P_X: yield of product by food[0m [1;34mk_abs: rate constant for absorption : k_P * y_Pc[0m [1;31mf_abs: scaled functional response for absorption : M_P/(M_P+M_K_P)[0m [1;34mk_dig: rate constant for digestion : k_X * y_Xg[0m [1;31mf_dig: scaled functional response for digestion : M_X/(M_X+M_K_X)[0m [1;34mk_c: release rate of carriers[0m [1;31mk_g: decay rate of enzyme[0m [1;34mM_c_per_cm2: area specific amount of carriers in the gut per unit of gut surface[0m [1;31mJ_g_per_cm2: secretion rate of enzyme per unit of gut surface per day[0m [1;34mconstant_M_c: Whether to assume a constant amount of carrier enzymes on the gut surface.[0m
